room_title: Escape room "The Office" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
room_description:
The assistant to the regional manager of a small paper company in Scranton, PA has gone rogue after years of trying to take over as the regional manager. You and the rest of the staff have broken into the office in the middle of the night to try to come up with a plan to stop him from taking over. However- when you get inside the office, the security guard accidentally locks you in and goes home for the night. It’s up to your team to find the most iconic items from The Office in order to escape and to stop the assistant to the regional manager from meeting with Corporate in New York in the morning.
Even if you aren’t a fan of “The Office” this escape room is still fun for all! You don’t need outside knowledge of The Office to win- but it makes it fun if you do!
Dressing up in office attire is not required- but encouraged!!
